title: aanandhamaana
sahitya:
AnandamAna sangItam idu arindavarkkE AtmabOdham



anupallavi



 tAnandamillAda tatparan uruvE sakala uyirgaLukkum santOSam niraivE



caraNam



 tunbangaL tIrum sukhamE shErum inbak-kaDaliduvE iNangiyE varum anbu 

perugiDum aruL viLaiyADum cinmaya harikEshan tiruvuLam nADum
